talk.author: did:plc:w4flffkmuaynmguakvkcjq3x
talk.utter: I tell you what...you have them. Take them away. Please!

talk.author: did:plc:mkoobrqqtgfxxxu5le7d5ig7
talk.utter: I have them already, they ARE my royal family. You're welcome!

talk.author: did:plc:w4flffkmuaynmguakvkcjq3x
talk.utter: I hadn't realised you live in the UK. I thought you could have them in Canada, and fund them. Rather than just having them metaphysically.

talk.author: did:plc:w4flffkmuaynmguakvkcjq3x
talk.utter: I hadn't realised you live in the UK. I thought you could have them in Canada, and fund them. Rather than just having them metaphysically.

talk.author: did:plc:mkoobrqqtgfxxxu5le7d5ig7
talk.utter: I live in Canada, not in the UK and royal family is my royal family. I guess you didn't know. But you know now. It seems you don't know much about many things, yet you still have strong opinions on them.

talk.author: did:plc:w4flffkmuaynmguakvkcjq3x
talk.utter: I do know that the royals "reign" over Canada, but I don't think your taxes go to them?That's why I suggested sending them over to permanently live in Canada. Why don't you try a little comprehension in place of unpleasant  snark?

talk.author: did:plc:w4flffkmuaynmguakvkcjq3x
talk.utter: I do know that the royals "reign" over Canada, but I don't think your taxes go to them?That's why I suggested sending them over to permanently live in Canada. Why don't you try a little comprehension in place of unpleasant  snark?

talk.author: did:plc:mkoobrqqtgfxxxu5le7d5ig7
talk.utter: Canada is a constitutional monarchy. Contrary to public rurumors, Canadians don't pay money" to the Royal Family. The only tax $$ we spent on the monarchy are for the Vice Regal offices and Royal Visits, much like we would spend on visits of any other international dignitaries.

talk.author: did:plc:w4flffkmuaynmguakvkcjq3x
talk.utter: So I was correct.  What point are you trying to make?
